headline: Auto industry in best shape 'for an upturn' in 40 yrs: Here's why
summary: Citi Research managing director Michael Ward tells Yahoo Finance he's "very bullish" on the strength of the auto industry, explaining one demand trend factor he thinks the market is overlooking.
